transcript:

Ungalukku buy leads ndradhu neenga koduthirukke category la vandhuttu thaan generate aagittu thaan irukku. But neenga consume pannittu thaan irukkeenga.

summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Customer wants only wooden statue buyleads.

- Customer says issue has not been resolved.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.

- Executive will inform the account manager.

- Executive will close the ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Account manager will call the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, resolution, ticket
